morse_converter module¶

class morse_converter.MorseConverter¶

Bases: object

A class to handle operations related to Morse code conversions.

_morse_dict¶

A private dictionary mapping characters to Morse code.

Type:

dict

property morse_dict: dict[str, str]¶

Returns a copy of the Morse code dictionary to ensure encapsulation.

Returns:

A copy of the Morse code dictionary.

Return type:

dict

morse_to_text(morse: str) → str¶

Converts Morse code to text by reversing the Morse dictionary.

Parameters:

morse (str) – The Morse code string to convert to text.

Returns:

The text string corresponding to the input Morse code.

Return type:

str

text_to_morse(text: str) → str¶

Converts text to Morse code using the Morse dictionary ignoring non-alphanumeric characters.

Parameters:

text (str) – The text to convert to Morse code.

Returns:

The Morse code string corresponding to the input text.

Return type:

str
